official_title: To ensure that predisaster hazard mitigation continues beyond 2005.
short_title: Disaster Preparation and Local Action Now Act

summary.text: Disaster Preparation and Local Action Now Act - Amends the Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act to extend through FY2010 the authority provided for predisaster hazard mitigation.

titles.title: Disaster Preparation and Local Action Now Act
To ensure that predisaster hazard mitigation continues beyond 2005.
